messages.content: You are a world-class tech resume writer.

Improve this resume bullet:
"{"name": "ESD Program", "issuer": "Zensar Technologies", "date": "2017", "description": "Successfully completed ESD program conducted by Zensar Technologies, Pune."}, {"name": "Employability Training", "issuer": "Barclays, Global Talent Track, and NASSCOM Foundation", "date": "2015", "description": "Successfully completed Employability training."}"
Delivered esd, program-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
You are a world-class tech resume writer.

You are a world-class tech resume writer.
